proposals.example: What took you so long so long
proposals.gesture: Use the index and thumb and then expand to select the two words, then move the right index to top to delete it
proposals.reasons: Part of it is from use of smart phone
proposals.notes: If we have virtual keyboard, it would be much easier

proposals.example: He likes to eat healthy when visiting visiting restaurants
proposals.gesture: (similar to delete group)Use the index and thumb and then expand to select the two words, then move the right index to top to delete it
proposals.reasons: Because I have already used it before

proposals.example: Tom is travelling to Berlin week(next)
proposals.gesture: Move the cursor with the index finger, then typing

proposals.example: How long have her had this fever? (have her -> has she)
proposals.gesture: Use the index and thumb and then expand to select the two words, then just type
proposals.reasons: Because I have already used the selection like this before
proposals.notes: She mentioned the trackpad that did not help her alot.

proposals.example: Use the index and thumb and then expand to select, then use the index to move the selection
proposals.gesture: It is similar to other gestures, it is the normal way to doing things

proposals.example: How far had Morino lived in America?
proposals.gesture: (similar to replace group)Use the index and thumb and then expand to select the two words, then just type
proposals.notes: She suggested that to typing the air would make it faster than using the physical keyboard, and only using one hand to typingsead of two hands

proposals.gesture: (similar to reordersingle) Use the index and thumb and then expand to select the two words, then use the index to move the selection
proposals.reasons: It is fast and easy to do

comments: At the begining it was a bit hard to imagne what is possible, but later it became more clear for me
